title: TOWER CRASH 3D
description: Crash the Tower! Only the best crashers will be able to destroy alltowers in this 3D physics game.Try to let all towers collapse with the amount of given balls. But you will only destroy the shapes with the same colour as you ball. Use the powerful earthquake or shotgun power ups, to create huge chain reactions, which will lead into the towers destruction. Beautiful designed levels and shapes will await you, so don’t waste any second and become the greatest tower crasher of ‘em all!
